References:

  • Bonjour et al. 2013. S. Bonjour, H. Adair-Rohani, J. Wolf, N.G. Bruce, S. Mehta, A. Prüss-Ustün, M. Lahiff, E.A. Rehfuess, V. Mishra, K.R. Smith. Solid fuel use for household cooking: Country and regional estimates for 1980-2010.
  • Global Tracking Framework Report (2013) http://trackingenergy4all.worldbank.org

  • UNSD Standard country or area codes for statistical use (M49) https://unstats.un.org/unsd/methodology/m49/
